Of A Centurion <WG1543> And <WG1161> Certain <WG5100> A Bondman <WG1401> Ill <WG2560> Being <WG2192> Was About <WG3195> To Die, <WG5053> Who <WG3739> Was <WG2258> By Him <WG846> Honoured. <WG1784>

<WG191> And Having Heard <WG1161> About <WG4012> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> He Sent <WG649> To <WG4314> Him <WG846> Elders <WG4245> Of The <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> Begging <WG2065> Him <WG846> That <WG3704> Having Come <WG2064> He Might Cure <WG1295> <WG3588> <WG1401> His Bondman. <WG846>

<WG3588> And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> Went <WG4198> With <WG4862> Them; <WG846> <WG2235> But Already <WG1161> He <WG846> Not <WG3756> Far <WG3112> Being Distant <WG568> From <WG575> The <WG3588> House, <WG3614> Sent <WG3992> To <WG4314> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Centurion <WG1543> Friends, <WG5384> Saying <WG3004> , To Him, <WG846> <WG2962> Lord, <WG3361> Trouble Not Thyself, <WG4660> Not <WG3756> For <WG1063> I Am <WG1510> Worthy <WG2425> That <WG2443> Under <WG5259> <WG3588> <WG4721> My Roof <WG3450> Thou Shouldest Come; <WG1525>

Wherefore <WG1352> Neither <WG3761> Myself <WG1683> Counted I Worthy <WG515> To <WG4314> Thee <WG4571> To Come; <WG2064> But <WG235> Say <WG2036> By A Word, <WG3056> And <WG2532> Shall Be Healed <WG2390> <WG3588> <WG3816> My Servant. <WG3450>

<WG2532> For Also <WG1063> I 1473 P-1NS A Man 444 N-NSM Am 1510 V-PXI-1S Under 5259 PREP Authority 1849 N-ASF Appointed, 5021 V-PPP-NSM Having 2192 V-PAP-NSM ' Under 5259 PREP Myself 1683 F-1ASM Soldiers, 4757 N-APM And 2532 CONJ I Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To This One 5129 D-DSM Go, 4198 V-AOM-2S And 2532 CONJ He Goes; 4198 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ To Another, 243 A-DSM Come, 2064 V-PNI-2S And 2532 CONJ He Comes; 2064 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-DSM 1401 N-DSM To My Bondman, 3450 P-1GS Do 4160 V-AAM-2S This, 5124 D-ASN And 2532 CONJ He Does It. 4160 V-PAI-3S

<WG191> And Having Heard <WG1161> These Things <WG5023> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Wondered At <WG2296> Him; <WG846> And <WG2532> Turning <WG4762> To The <WG3588> Following <WG190> Him <WG846> Crowd <WG3793> Said, <WG2036> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> Not Even <WG3761> In <WG1722> <WG3588> Israel <WG2474> So Great <WG5118> Faith <WG4102> Did I Find. <WG2147>
And <WG2532> Having Returned <WG5290> Those <WG3588> Sent <WG3992> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> House <WG3624> Found <WG2147> The <WG3588> Sick <WG770> Bondman <WG1401> In Good Health. <WG5198>

And <WG2532> It Came To Pass <WG1096> On <WG1722> The <WG3588> Next Day <WG1836> He Went <WG4198> Into <WG1519> A City <WG4172> Called <WG2564> Nain, <WG3484> And <WG2532> Went With <WG4848> Him <WG846> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> , Many <WG2425> And <WG2532> A Crowd <WG3793> Great. <WG4183>

<WG5613> And As <WG1161> He Drew Near <WG1448> To The <WG3588> Gate <WG4439> Of The <WG3588> City <WG4172> Also <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> Was Being Carried Out One <WG1580> Who Had Died, <WG2348> An Son <WG5207> Only <WG3439> <WG3588> <WG3384> To His Mother, <WG846> And <WG2532> She <WG846> <WG3778> Was <WG2258> A Widow, <WG5503> And <WG2532> A Crowd <WG3793> Of The <WG3588> City <WG4172> Considerable Was <WG2425> With <WG4862> Her. <WG846>
And <WG2532> Seeing <WG1492> Her <WG846> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Was Moved With Compassion <WG4697> ' On <WG1909> Her <WG846> And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> <WG846> To Her, <WG3361> Weep Not. <WG2799>

And <WG2532> Coming Up <WG4334> He Touched <WG680> The <WG3588> Bier, <WG4673> <WG3588> And Those <WG1161> Bearing It <WG941> Stopped. <WG2476> And <WG2532> He Said, <WG2036> Young Man, <WG3495> To Thee <WG4671> I Say, <WG3004> Arise. <WG1453>
And <WG2532> Sat Up <WG339> The <WG3588> Dead <WG3498> And <WG2532> Began <WG756> To Speak, <WG2980> And <WG2532> He Gave <WG1325> Him <WG846> <WG3588> <WG3384> To His Mother. <WG846>

<WG2983> And Seized <WG1161> Fear <WG5401> , All, <WG537> And <WG2532> They Glorified <WG1392> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> A Prophet <WG4396> Great <WG3173> Has Risen Up <WG1453> Amongst <WG1722> Us; <WG2254> <WG2532> And <WG3754> Has Visited <WG1980> <WG3588> God <WG2316> <WG3588> <WG2992> His People. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Went Out <WG1831> <WG3588> <WG3056> This Report <WG3778> In <WG1722> All <WG3650> <WG3588> Judea <WG2449> Concerning <WG4012> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Country Around. <WG4066>
And <WG2532> Brought Word <WG518> To John <WG2491> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> Concerning <WG4012> All <WG3956> These Things. <WG5130>

And <WG2532> Having Called To Him <WG4341> Two <WG1417> Certain <WG5100> <WG3588> <WG3101> Of His Disciples <WG846> <WG3588> John <WG2491> Sent Them <WG3992> To <WG4314> <WG3588> , Jesus, <WG2424> , Saying, <WG3004> <WG4771> Art Thou <WG1488> The <WG3588> Coming One <WG2064> Or <WG2228> Another <WG243> Are We To Look For? <WG4328>

<WG3854> And Having Come <WG1161> To <WG4314> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Men <WG435> , Said, <WG2036> John <WG2491> The <WG3588> Baptist <WG910> Has Sent <WG649> Us <WG2248> To <WG4314> Thee, <WG4571> , Saying, <WG3004> <WG4771> Art Thou <WG1488> The <WG3588> Coming One, <WG2064> Or <WG2228> Another <WG243> <WG4328> <WG4328>

In <WG1722> The Same <WG846> And <WG1161> <WG3588> Hour <WG5610> He Healed <WG2323> Many <WG4183> Of <WG575> Diseases <WG3554> And <WG2532> Scourges <WG3148> And <WG2532> Spirits <WG4151> Evil, <WG4190> And <WG2532> To Blind <WG5185> Many <WG4183> He Granted <WG5483> <WG3588> To See. <WG991>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> To Them, <WG846> Having Gone <WG4198> Relate <WG518> To John <WG2491> What <WG3739> Ye Have Seen <WG1492> And <WG2532> Heard; <WG191> That <WG3754> Blind <WG5185> Receive Sight, <WG308> Lame <WG5560> Walk, <WG4043> Lepers <WG3015> Are Cleansed, <WG2511> Deaf <WG2974> Hear, <WG191> Dead <WG3498> Are Raised, <WG1453> Poor <WG4434> Are Evangelized; <WG2097>
And <WG2532> Blessed <WG3107> Is <WG2076> <WG3739> <WG1437> Whoever <WG3361> Shall Not Be Offended <WG4624> In <WG1722> Me. <WG1698>

<WG565> And Having Departed <WG1161> The <WG3588> Messengers <WG32> Of John <WG2491> He Began <WG756> To Speak <WG3004> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Crowds <WG3793> Concerning <WG4012> John : <WG2491> What <WG5101> Have Ye Gone Out <WG1831> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Wilderness <WG2048> To Look At? <WG2300> A Reed <WG2563> By The <WG5259> Wind <WG417> Shaken? <WG4531>

But <WG235> What <WG5101> Have Ye Gone Out <WG1831> To See? <WG1492> A Man <WG444> In <WG1722> Soft <WG3120> Clothing <WG2440> Arrayed? <WG294> , Behold, <WG2400> They Who <WG3588> In <WG1722> Clothing <WG2441> Splendid <WG1741> And <WG2532> In Luxury <WG5172> Are Living <WG5225> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Palaces <WG934> Are. <WG1526>

But <WG235> What <WG5101> Have Ye Gone Out <WG1831> To See? <WG1492> A Prophet? <WG4396> Yea, <WG3483> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> And One <WG2532> More Excellent <WG4053> Than A Prophet. <WG4396>

This <WG3778> Is He <WG2076> Concerning <WG4012> Whom <WG3739> It Has Been Written, <WG1125> , Behold, <WG2400> I 1473 P-1NS Send 649 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-ASM 32 N-ASM My Messenger 3450 P-1GS Before 4253 PREP 4383 N-GSN Thy Face, 4675 P-2GS Who 3739 R-NSM Shall Prepare 2680 V-FAI-3S 3588 T-ASF 3598 N-ASF Thy Way 4675 P-2GS Before 1715 PREP Thee. 4675 P-2GS

I Say <WG3004> For <WG1063> To You, <WG5213> A Greater <WG3187> Among Those <WG1722> Born <WG1084> Of Women <WG1135> Prophet <WG4396> Than John <WG2491> The <WG3588> Baptist <WG910> No One <WG3762> Is; <WG2076> <WG3588> But He That Is <WG1161> Less <WG3398> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Greater <WG3187> Than He <WG846> Is. <WG2076>

And <WG2532> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> Having Heard <WG191> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> Justified <WG1344> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> Having Being Baptized With <WG907> The <WG3588> Baptism <WG908> Of John; <WG2491>

<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Doctors Of The Law <WG3544> The <WG3588> Counsel <WG1012> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Set Aside <WG114> As To <WG1519> Themselves, <WG1438> Not <WG3361> Having Been Baptized <WG907> ' By <WG5259> Him. <WG846>

<WG2036> And Said <WG1161> The <WG3588> , Lord, <WG2962> To What <WG5101> Therefore <WG3767> Shall I Liken <WG3666> The <WG3588> Men <WG444> Of <WG3588> Generation <WG1074> This? <WG3778> And <WG2532> To What <WG5101> Are They <WG1526> Like? <WG3664>

Like <WG3664> Are They <WG1526> To Little Children <WG3813> <WG3588> In <WG1722> A Market Place <WG58> Sitting, <WG2521> And <WG2532> <WG4377> <WG4377> One To Another <WG240> And <WG2532> <WG3004> <WG3004> , We Piped <WG832> To You, <WG5213> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Ye Did Not Dance; <WG3738> We Mourned <WG2354> , To You, <WG5213> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Ye Did Not Weep. <WG2799>

<WG2064> For Has Come <WG1063> John <WG2491> The <WG3588> Baptist <WG910> Neither <WG3383> Bread <WG740> Eating <WG2068> Nor <WG3383> Wine <WG3631> Drinking, <WG4095> And <WG2532> Ye Say, <WG3004> A Demon <WG1140> He Has. <WG2192>

And <WG2532> Was Justified <WG1344> <WG3588> Wisdom <WG4678> By <WG575> <WG3588> <WG5043> Her Children <WG846> All. <WG3956>

<WG2065> And Asked <WG1161> One <WG5100> Him <WG846> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> That <WG2443> He Should Eat <WG5315> ' With <WG3326> Him. <WG846> And <WG2532> Having Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> Of The <WG3588> Pharisee <WG5330> He Reclined At Table; <WG347>

And <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> A Woman <WG1135> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> City <WG4172> Who <WG3748> Was <WG2258> A Sinner, <WG268> Having Known <WG1921> That <WG3754> He Had Reclined At Table <WG345> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> Of The <WG3588> Pharisee, <WG5330> Having Taken <WG2865> An Alabaster Flask <WG211> Of Ointment, <WG3464>

And <WG2532> Standing <WG2476> At <WG3844> <WG3588> <WG4228> His Feet <WG846> Behind <WG3694> Weeping, <WG2799> Began <WG756> To Bedew <WG1026> <WG3588> <WG4228> His Feet <WG846> <WG3588> With Tears, <WG1144> And <WG2532> With The <WG3588> Hairs <WG2359> <WG3588> Of Head <WG2776> Her <WG846> She Was Wiping Them, <WG1591> And <WG2532> Was Ardently Kissing <WG2705> <WG3588> <WG4228> His Feet, <WG846> And <WG2532> Was Anointing Them <WG218> With The <WG3588> Ointment. <WG3464>

<WG1492> But Having Seen, <WG1161> The <WG3588> Pharisee <WG5330> Who <WG3588> Invited <WG2564> Him <WG846> Spoke <WG2036> Within <WG1722> Himself, <WG1438> , Saying, <WG3004> This Person <WG3778> If <WG1487> He Were <WG2258> A Prophet, <WG4396> <WG1097> Would Have Known <WG302> Who <WG5101> And <WG2532> What <WG4217> The <WG3588> Woman Is <WG1135> Who <WG3748> Touches <WG680> Him, <WG846> For <WG3754> A Sinner <WG268> She Is. <WG2076>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Him, <WG846> Simon, <WG4613> I Have <WG2192> To Thee <WG4671> Something <WG5100> To Say. <WG2036> <WG3588> And He <WG1161> Says, <WG5346> Teacher, <WG1320> Say It. <WG2036>

Two <WG1417> Debtors <WG5533> There Were <WG2258> To A Creditor <WG1157> Certain; <WG5100> The <WG3588> One <WG1520> Owed <WG3784> Denarii <WG1220> Five Hundred, <WG4001> <WG3588> And The <WG1161> Other <WG2087> Fifty. <WG4004>

<WG3361> <WG2192> But Not Having <WG1161> They Wherewith <WG846> To Pay, <WG591> Both <WG297> He Forgave : <WG5483> Which <WG5101> Therefore <WG3767> Of Them, <WG846> , Say, <WG2036> Most <WG4119> Him <WG846> Will Love? <WG25>

<WG611> And Answering <WG1161> <WG3588> Simon <WG4613> Said, <WG2036> I Take It <WG5274> That He <WG3754> To Whom <WG3739> The <WG3588> More <WG4119> He Forgave. <WG5483> <WG3588> And He <WG1161> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> Rightly <WG3723> Thou Hast Judged. <WG2919>

And <WG2532> Having Turned <WG4762> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Woman, <WG1135> <WG3588> To Simon <WG4613> He Said, <WG5346> Seest Thou <WG991> This <WG3778> <WG3588> Woman? <WG1135> I Entered <WG1525> Thy <WG4675> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> House, <WG3614> Water <WG5204> For <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG4228> My Feet <WG3450> <WG3756> Thou Gavest Not, <WG1325> <WG846> <WG3778> But She <WG1161> <WG3588> With Tears <WG1144> Bedewed <WG1026> My <WG3450> <WG3588> Feet, <WG4228> And <WG2532> With The <WG3588> Hairs <WG2359> <WG3588> Head <WG2776> Of Her <WG846> Wiped Them. <WG1591>

A Kiss <WG5370> To Me <WG3427> <WG3756> Thou Gavest Not, <WG1325> <WG846> <WG3778> But She <WG1161> ' From <WG575> Which Time <WG3739> I Came In <WG1525> <WG3756> Ceased Not <WG1257> Ardently Kissing <WG2705> My <WG3450> <WG3588> Feet. <WG4228>

With Oil <WG1637> <WG3588> <WG2776> My Head <WG3450> <WG3756> Thou Didst Not Anoint, <WG218> <WG846> <WG3778> But She <WG1161> With Ointment <WG3464> Anointed <WG218> My <WG3450> <WG3588> Feet. <WG4228>

<WG3739> For Which Cause <WG5484> I Say <WG3004> To Thee, <WG4671> Forgiven Have Been <WG863> <WG3588> <WG266> Her Sins <WG846> <WG3588> Many; <WG4183> For <WG3754> She Loved <WG25> <WG4183> Much; <WG3739> But To Whom <WG1161> Little <WG3641> Is Forgiven <WG863> Little <WG3641> He Loves. <WG25>
<WG2036> And He Said <WG1161> To Her, <WG846> Forgiven Have Been <WG863> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Sins. <WG266>

And <WG2532> Began <WG756> Those <WG3588> Reclining With Him <WG4873> To Say <WG3004> Within <WG1722> Themselves, <WG1438> Who <WG5101> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> Who <WG3739> Even <WG2532> Sins <WG266> Forgives? <WG863>
<WG2036> But He Said <WG1161> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Woman, <WG1135> <WG3588> <WG4102> Thy Faith <WG4675> Has Saved <WG4982> Thee; <WG4571> Go <WG4198> In <WG1519> Peace. <WG1515>
